title: Flame Blade
content:
Flame Blade Level 2 Evocation Spell Conjure a flaming scimitar in your hand that deals 3~18 Fire damage and sheds bright light in a 3m radius and dim light in a 6m radius. The blade can be unequipped and equipped again, but has to stay on the spellcaster's person. 10 turns Bonus ActionLevel 2 Spell Slot
